title: Gossip block signatures verification on main thread
body:
**Describe the bug**

Right now we verify gossip block proposer's signature on main thread but all other signatures on worker thread

**Expected behavior**

- Need to understand if it's better to also verify all gossip block's signatures on main thread because the faster we process the gossip block the better
- Add metric to track the time for it

with `v1.8.0-rc.0` the time to verify execution payload is bigger so it may not be a priority atm
